oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alienation and Hybridity. Patterns of Estrangement in the British Novel since the 1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Racolta, Remus
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper deals with the concepts of alienation and hybridity and their possible overlappings.
